message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's split it evenly. A fair deal saves time and money.
I'll give you a bit more again, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Time is running out, and the pie is shrinking. This is my final offer.
At this point, we've both lost so much to inflation. I'm willing to split it down the middle to end this.
